description: Rob and Nic just checked in to the Hotel. When they enter their room, they notice that theres only one bed. The Boys fight over it, Then Nic says Fuck it, and jumps into bed naked to deter Rob from sleeping on it. Little did he know that Rob was not giving up the bed that easily. He does the same and starts to jerk off right next to Nic. Once Nic turns over to tell him to stop it, he gets a look at Robs Hard Cock grabs a hold of it, and thats how it all unfolds.
title: Tight Asses
